title: MELODINE Japanese Soothing Massage Gel ? Muscle & Joint Pain Relief Cream For Shoulder, Neck, Back & Knee ? Fast-Absorbing Herbal Formula
description:
Infused withAmino Glucose, Hyaluronic Acid, Eucalyptus Extract, and Chondroitin Sulfate, this fast-absorbing gel targets pain at its source while nourishing the skin. Ideal forathletes, gym users, and anyone with daily body aches, it provides a cooling sensation that relaxes muscles and promotes faster recovery.

? Relieves shoulder, neck, back & knee pain

? Fast-absorbing, non-greasy gel formula

? Cooling & soothing effect for tired muscles

? Enriched with Japanese herbal ingredients

? Perfect for daily body massage and relaxation

Quality Copy
